QuestData.Title: Of Keys and Cages
QuestData.Description: From the little we know, the vrykul are conducting unnatural rites in an 'awakening' ritual to the west in Gjalerbron.$B$BThey're using living sacrifices to fuel their rituals.$B$B$n, you must stop this. It matters not who or what is in those cages, they must be freed. I would guess that the vrykul hold the keys.$B$BThe last thing we need is more of those strange vrykul threatening us, or worse, them wakening something even more evil....
QuestData.LogDescription: Greatmother Ankha has asked you to collect enough Gjalerbron Cage Keys to free 10 Gjalerbron Prisoners. Return to her at Camp Winterhoof when you manage to do so.
QuestData.CompletionText: With the prisoners at Gjalerbron freed, the vrykul will be unable to continue their rituals.
QuestData.RewardText: A great stone is lifted from my shoulders to hear of your success. And I smile to know that some you freed were taunka.$B$BPlease, take this as a gift for what you have done. I shall see to the health of those you freed.
